channel.title: Universal Music Publishing Group on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Universal Music Publishing Group on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: UMPG CEO Jodie Gerson Joins Gap’s Board of Directors
item.description: “I’m honored to join Gap Inc.’s Board of Directors and excited to bring my perspective and experience in the creative industries to the table,” Gerson said in a statement.
